content: this pocket scarf crochet pattern has simple stripes and heart motifs on the pockets this pattern was the seventh weekend mystery crochet along with underground crafter 1 > **this pattern is available for free on my blog here 2 ** > > the free version is supported by > advertising on my website the > downloadable pdf for sale on ravelry > includes the full pattern in one > printable file without advertisements **skills used** basic crochet stitches chain double_crochet single_crochet slip_stitch treble triple crochet crocheting flat in row crocheting in the round increasing crocheting in the back loop only includes links to video tutorials crocheting in chain spaces joining with mattress stitch seam double treble_crochet stitch includes video tutorials joining with whipstitch seam includes link to photo tutorial **skill level** easy **finished size** teen/adult scarf 7 18 cm wide x 60 75 153 5 cm long with pockets seamed pockets 7 5 19 cm deep heart motif 4 75 12 cm from tip to center of bumps **materials** eddie bauer cozy camp 3 yarn 100% recycled acrylic 3 5 oz/100 g 229 yd/200 m 2 skeins in pacific blue ca and 1 skein in scarlet cb *or approximately 455 yd 416 m and 155 yd 142 m in any medium weight yarn * tip you may want to choose red for one of the colors if you select alternative yarns knitter s pride waves 4 us size j-10/6 mm crochet hook *or any size needed to obtain correct gauge * yarn needle locking stitch markers or pins optional for seaming **gauge** 14 double_crochet = 4 10 cm across *exact gauge is not critical for this project * 10 row in alternating double_crochet row/single_crochet row pattern = 4 10 cm tall *exact gauge is not critical for this pattern * 1 https //undergroundcrafter com/2022/01/28/weekend-mystery-crochet-alongs/ 2 https //undergroundcrafter com/2024/01/05/crochet-pattern-warm-hands-warm-heart/ 3 https //prf hn/l/zpqrv4o 4 https //amzn to/48vc1ee
